statements: SELECT * FROM transaction_table;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, purchase_amount FROM transaction_table;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date FROM transaction_table ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, product_id FROM transaction_table WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT MAX(purchase_amount) AS max_purchase_amount, MIN(purchase_amount) AS min_purchase_amount FROM transaction_table;
SELECT * FROM transaction_table WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, purchase_amount FROM transaction_table WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase_amount FROM transaction_table WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM purchase_date) = 12;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, purchase_amount FROM transaction_table WHERE product_id = '23e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, purchase_date FROM transaction_table WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM transactions WHERE purchase_amount > 50;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM transactions ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM discount_offers WHERE valid_from <= '2022-01-01' AND valid_until >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, discount_code, discount_amount FROM discount_offers WHERE discount_amount < 10;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_purchase DESC
SELECT transaction_id, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 101 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_transactions > 5 ORDER BY total_transactions DESC
SELECT t.customer_id, d.discount_code FROM transactions AS t INNER JOIN discount_offers AS d ON t.customer_id = d.customer_id
SELECT * FROM transaction WHERE purchase_amount > 100
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, purchase_amount FROM transaction WHERE customer_id = 101 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM discount_offer WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT customer_id, AVG(discount_amount) AS avg_discount FROM discount_offer GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_discount > 50
SELECT * FROM transaction WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customer c JOIN transaction t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id;
SELECT t.purchase_amount, d.discount_amount FROM transaction t JOIN discount_offer d ON t.customer_id = d.customer_id WHERE t.purchase_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM discount_offer WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31' ORDER BY discount_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM transactions ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;

SELECT customer_name, start_date, end_date FROM customers JOIN customer_discounts ON customers.customer_id = customer_discounts.customer_id JOIN discounts ON discounts.discount_id = customer_discounts.discount_id;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(purchase_amount) AS max_purchase_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id;
SELECT discount_percentage, start_date, end_date FROM discounts WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';

SELECT customer_name, email, discount_percentage FROM customers JOIN customer_discounts ON customers.customer_id = customer_discounts.customer_id JOIN discounts ON customer_discounts.discount_id = discounts.discount_id WHERE discount_percentage > 0.1;
SELECT * FROM transaction;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM product;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM transaction;
SELECT offer_id, product_id, discounts_amount, expiry_date FROM discount_offer;
SELECT * FROM transaction WHERE purchase_amount > 1000
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customer ORDER BY last_name ASC
SELECT product_name, price FROM product WHERE category = 'Electronics'
SELECT * FROM transaction WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'
SELECT product.product_name, discount_offer.discount_amount FROM product JOIN discount_offer ON product.product_id = discount_offer.product_id
